comments: i took him for business law.. def a great professor.. gotta say i thought it was normal i would of kept in touch with the professor.. lol.. he know how to teach and put the topics he taught towards everyday events that his students would go through. learned alot

He is a great guy and he teaches you everything you have to know for the subject. He makes it as easy as he can and he describes every concept with a funny joke or experiance. His tests are not hard and you learn all the makor terms and concepts. He teaches with real life experiance not just because he knows the books inside out.

great profesor..wish i can take him again if i can. such a nice person. if u have a problem he will understand and make time for u. he takes time with his students. always there to help even though some students take him for granted. always giving chances to students over and over again. do his extra credits!!
